transcript.text: today me and my boys we're going to go

organic all natural gluten free and it's
made from bear grylls own dehydrated
urine that's dehydrated pee that's right
bear grizz will tell anyone that in any
survival situation the first thing you
do is drink your own urine
however for most of us the thought of
drinking our own urine is a bit daunting
but luckily we have grizwiz so we don't
have to drink our own urine we can drink
bear grylls urine
all you have to do is mix one scoop of
grizz whiz dehydrated urine powder with
any source of fresh clean water and
there you have it instant fresh urine
after all you pee more than water so why
shouldn't you drink more than water but
grizz whiz isn't just a survival tool
it's also great for rehydrating after
workouts and for passing random drug
tests and now grizzwiz comes in two
flavors original flavor and asparagus
also don't forget to check out bear
grylls new line of survival bars for a
smooth healthy snack out on the trail
don't forget to use promo code outdoor
boys to get this awesome griz whiz
survival flask with your first purchase
of any of the new griz whiz products
and once again thank you grizzwiz for
sponsoring this video
